img_above_text:
When the queen of spiders finally falls to your assault, she'll beat a hasty retreat to return to wherever she's hidden the Sage's Relic. You'll need to follow quickly, because a literal spider army will appear to give chase!
Violet Spider
img_below_text:
Quickly run toward the cave entrance on the far side, and don't stop sprinting for anything.
![Wukong LowerHollow 87.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/c/c0/Wukong_LowerHollow_87.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "When the queen of spiders finally falls to your assault, she'll beat a hasty retreat to return to wherever she's hidden the Sage's Relic. You'll need to follow quickly, because a literal spider army will appear to give chase!
Violet Spider"
            - Following Text: "Quickly run toward the cave entrance on the far side, and don't stop sprinting for anything.
![Wukong LowerHollow 87.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/c/c0/Wukong_LowerHollow_87.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong" where the protagonist is kneeling in a cave, surrounded by spider webs and a swarm of spiders. The preceding text indicates that the player has just defeated the queen of spiders and must quickly follow her to retrieve the Sage's Relic while being chased by a spider army. The following text advises the player to sprint towards the cave entrance without stopping. The image serves to illustrate the intense and perilous moment right after the queen's defeat, emphasizing the urgency and danger of the situation.
